source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a stationary train made of shipping containers. The containers, branded with Red Bull and Prada logos, have been converted into a long skatepark with a series of ramps. A red graphic arrow is overlaid on the image, tracing a path along the course.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a stationary train made of shipping containers. The containers, branded with Red Bull and Prada logos, have been converted into a long skatepark with a series of ramps. A red graphic arrow is overlaid on the image, tracing a path along the course.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides single file along a winding mountain road, each taking turns leading the pack. As they approach a sharp bend, the lead cyclist signals and the group slows down, maintaining their formation. A blue animated line appears on the screen, highlighting their route through the curve.
